title: Ep. 14 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Today, on 2 Bears 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer talk about what they’re thankful for. After Tom’s “Toast” video with Sam Adams dropped, it got the Bears to thinking about what they should give thanks for this holiday season. We get a sample of Bert’s award winning impressions, interactions with alcoholics and some wild stories about “apologies.”
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
